commands.command: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY table_schema,table_name) AS Row, table_schema,table_name, column_name, data_type + isnull('(' + cast( character_maximum_length as varchar) + ')', '') type , CASE IS_NULLABLE WHEN 'no' then ' NOT NULL' ELSE '' END data_type, NUMERIC_PRECISION, NUMERIC_SCALE, column_default 'default' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns ORDER BY 1,2, ordinal_position
